author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Move the HGCal algorithms for dd4hep in Geometry/HGCalCommonData and rearrange the test code in view of the transitions of other HGCal DD-algorithms

#### PR validation:

Tested using the test codes in Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx212 Rearrange Geometry/HGCalCommonData in view of DD4Hep transition
